EmailTemplate.description: Email response to customers who've opted for paperless billing
EmailTemplate.name: 18-03 Response to Paperless Billing Request
EmailTemplate.subject: We Have Received Your Request to Sign Up for Paperless Billing!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName}
Thank You for Signing Up for Paperless Billing!
We have taken you off our mailing list and you will now be receive your BlueWave bill via email.
If you have any questions regarding paperless billing please feel free to reach out to Customer Care at customercare@bluewavesolar.com or (844) 786-4100.
Thank you for helping us to provide Solar for Everyone, Everywhere.
- All of us here at BlueWave
